DOC.brief_summary: More one three US woman suffers distress , embarrass , often unreported problem urinary incontinence ( UI ) . UI severity increase age financial cost exceeds $ 19 billion per year . The Adult Conservative Management Committee 2008 International Consultation Incontinence conclude pelvic floor muscle training ( PFMT ) offer first line therapy woman stress , urge , mixed UI ; bladder training ( BT ) may prefer drug therapy . Conservative strategy low risk differ form UI management prejudice future treatment . They also may decrease symptom urgency frequency entail UI , greatly reduce quality life nearly 1 11 US woman .
DOC.detailed_description: The study attempt accomplish 3 aim : Aim 1 : Compare outcomes two-hour BH Class condense DVD version . To accomplish aim conduct comparative effectiveness trial 600 woman 55 year old randomize BH Class DVD . Women follow 24 month post-intervention order ass long-term outcome sustainability . Aim 2 : Conduct economic analysis compare two-hour BH Class DVD version . Describing cost , quality life , analyze willingness pay employment/ productivity data primary economic focus study . Aim 3 : Conduct qualitative analysis gain insight element intervention contribute sustainability . Inclusion/Exclusion Criteria Inclusion : 1 . Female , age 55 year old 2 . An additive sum frequency ( question 1 ) volume ( question 2 ) item International Consultation Incontinence Questionnaire-Short Form ≤5 3 . Negative demonstrable UI standardize Paper Towel Test 4 . Willing undergo vaginal/pelvic examination 5 . Willing able compliant visit schedule study procedure study duration 6 . Provide write informed consent form 7 . Able understand read English Exclusion : 1 . Non-ambulatory ( patient confine bed wheelchair ) 2 . Persistent pelvic pain ( define daily pelvic pain ) 3 . History neurologic disease ( e.g . Cerebral Vasular Accident , Parkinson 's disease , Multiple sclerosis , Epilepsy , Spinal cord tumor trauma , spina bifida , current symptomatic herniated disc ) 4 . Actively take UI , OAB , bladder control medication . 5 . Other urinary condition procedure may affect continence status ( e.g . history bladder cancer , urethral diverticulum , previous augmentation cystoplasty artificial sphincter ; implant nerve stimulators urinary symptom , history sling surgery UI prolapse ) 6 . Participation another research project may influence result trial 7 . Pelvic organ prolapse protrude past introitus upon strain 8 . Absolute absence pelvic floor muscle strength manifest zero Brink test ( Brink et al. , 1994 pressure displacement 9 9 . Evidence UTI hematuria - Urine dipstick positive red blood cell exclude participant enrollment study microscopic urinalysis negative . Urine dipstick positive leukocyte plus nitrate exclude participant enrollment study require evaluation UTI . 10 . History > 2 recurrent UTI 's past year one UTI within 6 month 11 . Post void residual > 150 cc
